faq.title: Got Questions?
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before getting started

q1.question: Is it complicated to set up?
q1.answer: Not at all! Most users are live in under 5 minutes. We also have video guides to help you.

q2.question: What if I need help?
q2.answer: We offer friendly support via chat and email for all paid plans. Our team is based in Bali and understands local business needs.

q3.question: Will it work with my existing WhatsApp number?
q3.answer: Yes! You can use your current WhatsApp Business number. We'll guide you through the simple verification process with Meta.

q4.question: Can the AI handle Foreign language?
q4.answer: Absolutely! Our AI is trained specifically for every language business context, understands slang, and can communicate in languange that use by customer.

q5.question: What happens if I get a message the AI can't answer?
q5.answer: The AI will automatically notify you and can even forward complex inquiries to your personal WhatsApp. You're always in control.

q6.question: What are 'Reply Credits'?
q6.answer: One (1) Reply Credit is used each time our AI replies to a message from your customer. Incoming messages from customers are not counted. Simple and fair.

q7.question: What happens if I run out of monthly credits?
q7.answer: No worries! If your 'Business' or 'Pro' plan credits run out, we'll automatically use overage rates (e.g., Rp 350/credit for 'Business') to keep your service running. You can also top-up additional credits anytime.

q8.question: What's the difference between 'Flex' and 'Starter' plans?
q8.answer: The 'Starter' plan gives you 50 free credits/month but stops when exhausted. The 'Flex' plan has no free credits, but you can top-up any amount (starting from Rp 50,000) at Rp 500 per credit and credits won't expire as long as you're active.

q9.question: Can I change plans midway?
q9.answer: Absolutely. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime. Our system will automatically calculate prorated adjustments.
